rows.label: tlk45700152_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My name's Hamoosh. I'm with the
Lost Technology Bureau.

rows.label: tlk45700152_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Our main job is to send salvaged
items over to the Technological
Research Center for proper analysis.

rows.label: tlk45700152_01_msg0003
rows.name:
It's thanks to organized systems like
this that Superbia boasts the highest
technological standards in Alst.
